{{cpp/iterator/istreambuf_iterator/title|equal}}
{{cpp/iterator/istreambuf_iterator/navbar}}
{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl|
bool equal( const istreambuf_iterator&amp; it ) const;
}}
{{dcl end}}

Checks whether both {{c|*this}} and {{c|it}} are valid, or both are invalid, regardless of the stream buffer objects they use.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|it|another stream buffer iterator to compare to}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
{{c|true}} if both {{c|*this}} and {{c|it}} are valid, or both are invalid, {{c|false}} otherwise.

{{cpp/impldef exception}}
